[Type 2 diabetes](https://diabetesmantra.com/type-2-diabetes/) occurs when the body's ability to use insulin is lost. [Gestational diabetes](https://diabetesmantra.com/gestational-diabetes/) is a disease that pregnant women get when their bodies aren't able to create and utilize insulin properly during pregnancy.
